recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to the mixture.
Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt; mix into the creamed mixture.
Mix in the chocolate chips.
Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans.
Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.

recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).
Roll out pizza dough to desired shape and thickness.
Brush dough with olive oil and spread minced garlic evenly.
Spread crushed tomatoes over the dough, sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Arrange mozzarella slices and basil leaves on top.
Bake in preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, washed and chopped
steps: In a large salad bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad.
Toss everything together until the lettuce is evenly coated.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add sliced beef and cook until browned. Remove beef from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add onion and garlic, cooking until soft.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Stir in flour and gradually add beef broth and mustard; bring to a simmer.
Return beef to skillet and cook until heated through.
Remove from heat and stir in sour cream. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve over cooked egg noodles or rice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and stir-fry for about 30 seconds, until fragrant.
Add bell pepper, broccoli, carrot, and zucchini; stir-fry until vegetables are tender yet crisp.
Stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil; mix well.
Cook for an additional 2 minutes. Serve hot.
